name: Battle Tanks!
description:
Do you miss playing games on the same computer without having to deal with the hassles of online games? So do I, and present to you: Tank Battle: 1v1 Madness. The first one to win 5 rounds wins the game.

Controls:

Player 1: 
w: forward
s: back
a: left
d: right
space: shoot

Player 2:
arrow keys to move
'enter' or 'return' to shoot.

keep holding the shoot button to increase power.
